environment
Interface IEnvironment

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
IEnvironmentSingle, IEnvironmentTwoPlayers
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractEnvironmentSingle, AbstractMember, AbstractMemberV2, Acrobot, AcrobotCLS2, AcrobotCLS2Tiling, AcrobotCLS2TilingSimple, AliceMaze, AliceMazeContinuousDistance, AliceMazeDistance, ArmN, ArmNV2, Brazzaville, CarRental, Circuit, CircularCircuit, Congo, ElementaryMultiAgentEnvironment, ElementaryMuscleEnvironment, ElementaryMuscleEnvironmentV2, ElementaryMuscleTiling, GamblerGame, JengaTower, LocalVisionMaze, Maze, MemoryBoard, MemoryBoardZP, MountainCar, MountainCarTiling, MountainCarTilingH, Pinball, TicTacToeBoard
public interface IEnvironment
extends java.io.Serializable

The game's rules :

  • Gives the list of possible actions from a given state.
  • Computes the next state, given a start state and an action.
  • Knows when a state is final.
  • Knows whether a state is a winning one.

Author:
Francesco De Comite (decomite at lifl.fr)

whoWins

int whoWins(IState s)
Who won ?
  • Two-players game :
    • Player One : -1
    • Tie : 0
    • Player Two : 1
  • Single-player game :
    • Win : -1
    • Null: 0
    • Loose: 1
